name: Oateo Rolled Oats
description: Steamed and flattened. OATEO’s Rolled oats is the top notch choice for all weight watchers who have embraced a healthy lifestyle. Perfect for making baked goodies, this variant is a natural source of energy and fibre that helps control cholesterol. Packed with nutritional qualities, OATEO’s Rolled oats are not only healthy but flavoursome as well! *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
